name: Crow's Nest
description:
Be the pirate lord of Crow’s Nest!
Establish and rule over your own pirate's haven in this immersive city builder game. As the mastermind behind it all, ensure your crew of hardy pirates has all they need to live, thrive, and improve their quarters on your island.

Establish Order and Fear
Your swashbucklers have captured prisoners during their high-seas adventures who are the lifeblood of your island's development. Maintain control through order and fear. Be careful though, you must meet their basic needs to prevent mutiny.

Resource Acquisition
Managing a pirate base isn't only about building - it's about smart acquisition. Goods and resources captured from your sea exploits are important, but they are just part of your growing inventory. Cultivate your island, reap its resources, and ensure your stockpile is always full to keep your pirate base thriving.

Develop Your Refuge
Provide your crew with plots of land for building and upgrading their own homes. Also, construct taverns for them to enjoy good food and drinks, keeping their spirits high.

Seize the Seas
Your crew thrives on piracy. They don't build ships - they seize them, growing the fleet under your flag. Use these captured vessels for further exploits, bringing wealth and resources back to your base.
